last_episode_to_air.name: The Last Breakfast
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mackenzie has a revelation; Piper ramps up her investigation; Chicago arrives in Clump.

name: Irreverent
overview: A criminal from Chicago who bungles a heist is forced to hideout in a small Australian reef town in Far North Queensland posing as the new church Reverend.
tagline: Never judge a criminal by his cover.

episodes.name: The Lord Giveth and the Lord Taketh Away
episodes.overview: An American criminal hides in a Far North Queensland town, posing as the new reverend to stay alive.

episodes.name: Louts and Fishes
episodes.overview: Mack tracks down the real reverend while trying to officiate a wedding without being caught.

episodes.name: Ashes to Ashes
episodes.overview: Mack gets involved in an illegal tobacco trade to get the money he needs for a new identity.

episodes.name: The Wisdom of Mack
episodes.overview: To avoid the church's closure, Mack must reunite two families and save Daisy from a court judge.

episodes.name: The Prodigal Wife
episodes.overview: Mack pretends to be married to the real reverendâ€™s wife to stop everything from falling apart.

episodes.name: Serpent in the Garden
episodes.overview: Mack stops the supply of tobacco to get a better deal for Agnes; Charmaine catches up to Mackenzie.

episodes.name: Lost Sheep
episodes.overview: Cameron destroys a biker's ride, so Mack breaks into the safe at the sugar mill to pay for it.

episodes.name: Unholy Matrimony
episodes.overview: Chicago catches up with Mackenzie; Mack tries to figure out who has the safe full of cash.

episodes.name: Double Cross
episodes.overview: Daisy struggles with her health; Mack deals with the bikers once and for all.

episodes.name: The Last Breakfast
episodes.overview: Mackenzie has a revelation; Piper ramps up her investigation; Chicago arrives in Clump.
